Text.Page:
Imps. Sounds like a cute band of youngsters, but they're more and more a formidable trouble.

Bring down their numbers and their masters for us. It would really help us focus on what's important here.

Oh, good, you've brought...ears. All right then.

Here. It's...a reward. For the...ears.
We really need those imps out of our way. We have enough troubles without that lot to deal with.
